entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM routing issue #44071
  • Blazor server page route template "catch-all" gives error in case of double asterisk in the pattern #44067
  • DotNetObjectReference multiple instances created, only last one disposed #44064
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, https, plainTextWithFilter #44063
  • BlazorServer doesn't release circuits/component instances after 25mins+forced GC2 #44062
  • GH Issue label descriptions for severity-* labels #44049
  • Android SignalR Java Client - OnErrorNotImplementedException #44046
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, json, plaintext_nodejs #44044
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_nodejs, plaintext #44043

Closed

  • .NET 7 RC1 blazor WASM size regression #44060
  • Blazor @key not working when inside RenderFragment or Repeater like component #44039
    Discussions
  • Receive an error alert pop when I debug a fresh BlazorWasm app in VS Code #44057
  • mimetype for br and gz files is missing from published web.config WASM app #44053
    Discussions
  • Error "Assembly paths must be rooted" when referencing COM #21480
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Unable to get Offline Auth work #23286
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor WASM PWA's service worker causes issue with OpenID Connect #44023
  • Print the output from the devserver process #42614
    7.0-rc2
  • Android SIgnalR Java Client - OnErrorNotImplementedException #44058
  • Creating TestServer without WebApplicationFactory #44047

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Revert Ubuntu.1804.Armarch.Open change #44074
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Revert Ubuntu.1804.Armarch.Open change #44073
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.0
  • Update to stable Roslyn versions #44072
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0.0
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-rtm.22468.5 #44069
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Update the SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22469.4 #44066
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix DetectMisplacedLambdaAttribute analyzer and tests #44061
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Change gRPC JSON to only accept top-level field as request body #44055
    area-grpc, 7.0.0
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `822849d` to `f94b3a5` #44050
    area-infrastructure
  • Add RequestDelegate analyzer #44048
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c29315d` to `1336c4b` #44051
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #44034
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Get template error codes from the right processes #44032
    area-mvc, feature-templates, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix the name of the maestro-bot user. #44042
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1997961 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix ProjectTemplate test failure logs on helix #43789
    area-mvc
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution, .NET 8 Planning
